title: Lake Roosevelt National Recreation Area: Basic Information
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information             Basic Information           Physical Address           Lake Roosevelt National Recreation Area 1008 Crest Drive  Coulee Dam, WA 99116                 Directions         From Spokane Take I-90 West At Exit 277, merge onto US-2 toward Davenport/Fairchild AFB/Spokane Airport Just past Wilbur, turn right onto WA-21 Stay left onto Highway 174 Turn right onto WA-155 Stay on WA-155 past Grand Coulee Dam and into the town of Coulee Dam Cross the Columbia River and continue on WA-155 Turn right onto Crest Drive and follow up the hill. The Headquarters Office is located on the left  Directions Details           Operating Hours & Seasons         All Park Hours The park is open 24 hours per day, unless otherwise designated (i.e. Day Use Areas, etc.)   Standard Hours    Sunday: Open 24 hours   Monday: Open 24 hours   Tuesday: Open 24 hours   Wednesday: Open 24 hours   Thursday: Open 24 hours   Friday: Open 24 hours   Saturday: Open 24 hours             Weather           Lake Roosevelt is generally a cool or cold place from fall through spring with overcast skies. In the summer, the skies clear and present warm to hot days.          Fees & Passes     Entrance Fees:   Boat Launch Week Permit - $8.00 A week long boat long pass is valid for seven, consecutive days.    Boat Launch Annual Pass - $45.00 The annual boat launch permit is good from the time of purchase through the calendar year.   In-Season Camping Fee - $18.00 The In-Season Camping Fee is current from May 1st - September 30th.   Off-Season Camping Fee - $9.00 The Off-Season Camping Fee is from October 1st - April 30th.   Entrance Passes:   Annual Boat Launch Pass - $45.00 The pass allows the holder to launch their boat and covering their parking from the time of purchase through the calendar year.         Visitor Centers              Â      Hawk Creek Campground NPS   Whether it's camping, boating, swimming, fishing, local history, or just a nice Sunday drive, Lake Roosevelt National Recreation Area has a little something for everyone.
